item.title: Crack My Luggage Update 1
item.description: In my original upload it didn't quite solve the puzzle correctly, leading to frustrating users. :-) A fixed copy is availabe here.

item.title: Crack My Luggage - Turbobasic XL ten liner
item.description:
After seeing Bill Kendrick's Minijong I knew I had to go back and re-work GozMind. I stole.. I mean, borrowed, Bill's character redefinition ideas, and replaced the symbols with the number 1-6. The result is Crack My Luggage.

Introduction

Silly me, I've lost the code to my luggage and I'll …
item.dc:creator: gozar

item.title: GozMind - My 10 liner for the NOMAM 2014 competition
item.description: Over Christmas break I really started to get back into using my Atari 800xl. I got my MyIDE+Flash set up to work with Action! because I've always wanted to learn it. Then I read about the BASIC Ten-Liners - Contest 2014. I had a snow day today, so I am …
